text: The Ackerman Union fee likely helps pay workers and keeps things maintained. I work in Ackerman and we’re very lucky to get paid some administrative leave during all of this. I know it sometimes feels like it’s not fair but it is appreciated. Student and career workers alike need the Ackerman budget to help provide salaries and keep stores open.
No in person classes and no graduation sadly. Beyond disappointed :( I’m trying to find silver linings but not there yet
